schema_description: This schema is a schema for extracting data from a letter of employment.

schema_definition.title: Employment Letter Salary Extractor
schema_definition.description: This schema is used to extract the employee's name and salary details from a letter of employment. The salary object includes the amount and the frequency of payment.

employee_name.description: The full name of the employee as stated in the letter of employment. The name should be properly capitalized.

salary.description: The salary details of the employee as stated in the letter of employment.

amount.description: The numerical representation of the salary amount, without the currency symbol.

frequency.description: The time frequency at which the employee is paid. It should be one of the following values: 'annually', 'monthly', 'biweekly', 'weekly', or 'hourly'.
